title: AI Content Autopilot Input
description: Configure the orchestration of the content intelligence pipeline.

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key (Secret)
openaiApiKey.description: Your private OpenAI API Key. This is required and will be passed to all actors in the pipeline.

pipelinesToInclude.title: Pipelines to Process
pipelinesToInclude.description: Select the news and data pipelines to use as the source.

newsFreshnessHours.title: Data Freshness (Hours)
newsFreshnessHours.description: Actors will be rerun if their last successful run is older than this value.

runAggregator.title: Run Topic Aggregator
runAggregator.description: Stage 1: Gathers articles and clusters them into trending topics.

runKeywordAnalysis.title: Run Keyword Analysis
runKeywordAnalysis.description: Stage 2: Enriches topics with keyword data and search volume.

runSentimentAnalysis.title: Run Sentiment Analysis
runSentimentAnalysis.description: Stage 3: Analyzes the sentiment for each trending topic.

runIdeaGeneration.title: Run Content Idea Generator
runIdeaGeneration.description: Stage 4: Generates creative content blueprints for the final topics.

outputFormats.title: Output Content Formats
outputFormats.description: Select which content formats to generate in the final stage.
